thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Beijing Yuanlong Yato Culture Dissemination sees FY 2018 Q1 net profit up 50 pct to 100 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Beijing Yuanlong Yato Culture Dissemination sees FY 2018 Q1 net profit up 50 pct to 100 pct

organizations.name: beijing yuanlong yato culture dissemination co ltd

text:
March 6(Reuters) - Beijing Yuanlong Yato Culture Dissemination Co Ltd :
* Sees FY 2018 Q1 net profit to increase by 50 percent to 100 percent, or to be 15.7 million yuan to 21.0 million yuan
* Says FY 2017 Q1 net profit was 10.5 million yuan
* The reasons for the forecast are increased sales promotion orders of big customers and effect of Spring Festival promotion orders Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/zjGSQm Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
